subject: Re: how to avoid multiple initialization ?
msgSnippet: ... initialization to be done ONCE for all tests. ... Please search using Google keywords: JUnit one-time initialization Thank you.
messageBody:
--- In junit@yahoogroups.com, "Kireitchik, Valeri"
<valeri.kireitchik@i...> wrote:
> Dear all,
>
> could you help in the following:
>
> Several test are united in one test class. I want some
initialization to be done ONCE for all tests.
> I sow only 2 possibilities where to place initialization code:
> 1) setUp() method
> 2) constructor

Please search using Google keywords: JUnit one-time initialization

Thank you.
